keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing the economic recovery so that all hardworking people feel the benefits.
Supporting families, increasing free childcare and building schools we can be proud of.
Only the Conservatives will deliver a straight In/Out EU referendum. No ifs, no buts.

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Conservatives will deliver a straight In/Out EU referendum. No ifs, no buts.
issues.economy: Securing the economic recovery so that all hardworking people feel the benefits.
issues.education: Building schools we can be proud of.
